word:
A Call for Christlike Workers. 

                      St. Helena, Cal., June 29, 1903. 

To a Young Physician-- 


     My Dear Brother: There is still a burden upon my mind in your behalf. I would say to you, The Lord lives and reigns. Take hold of His work in any place where you can. If you bring yourself to Him as a consecrated offering, making no reserve, He will accept you.
